title: The Village in the wheatfields
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Great Britain - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Village communities - Great Britain
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Great Britain - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Festivals - Great Britain
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Village communities - Great Britain
description: A picture of village life in the farming areas of Norfolk and Suffolk. The camera passes among the villagers, their recreation, seasonal festivities and weddings, and follows at the same time the progress of the wheat crop - the foundation of the whole life of the village. Emphasis in the film is on the traditional life and ways of the countryside and the beauty of the changing seasons.
